local_intent: Perceive milk_carton, perform ApproachAndAlign with 0.01 tolerance, then verify proximity/alignment before push.
assumptions: IsAt(target=milk_carton) is a sufficient proxy to verify alignment completion.
coherence_with_global: Implements detection and ApproachAndAlign steps of the GLOBAL_BT with identical parameters, adds limited retries consistent with failure_and_recovery, and verifies position before subsequent push.
